Package com.harmonia.backend.service

Class PublicMessageService

java.lang.Object
com.harmonia.backend.service.PublicMessageService
@Service public class PublicMessageService extends Object
Service class for managing public messages.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Harmonia Team
